metadata.title: CVE-2021-28116 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Squid through 4.14 and 5.x through 5.0.5, in some configurations, allowsinformation disclosure because of an out-of-bounds read in WCCP protocoldata. This can be leveraged as part of a chain for remote code execution asnobody.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 4.10-1ubuntu1.5
squid-cgi - 4.10-1ubuntu1.5
squid-common - 4.10-1ubuntu1.5
squid-purge - 4.10-1ubuntu1.5
squidclient - 4.10-1ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.10-1ubuntu1.5').
